snippet: Tony Sparano, the Jets new offensive coordinator, has shown no tolerance for inefficiency during the team’s early days of training camp.
abstract: New York Jets new offensive coordinator Tony Sparano is showing no tolerance for inefficiency during the team's early days of training camp.
